DEMO_524_MSG_010:
́No!! This cannot be! How could Prometheus have been defeated... !?
ā
DEMO_524_MSG_020: ́I don't understand... how can this be? How can a clone have ended up with this much power... ?
DEMO_524_MSG_030:
̂You just can't seem to get it through your thick skull. 
Humanity's potential has no limitations.
ā
DEMO_524_MSG_040: ̂When we put our minds and hearts into it, we are able to overcome our fears and harness unfathomable amounts of power!
DEMO_524_MSG_050:
́What... what a mockery! I can't afford to make any more blunders.
ā
DEMO_524_MSG_070:
́So be it... the time for us to battle is not now.
I'll be waiting for you at the Core.
DEMO_524_MSG_100:
̂ȁ... you've finally learned the truth 
about yourself... your true origins.
DEMO_524_MSG_090: ̂The final battle... it's finally upon us.
DEMO_524_MSG_110: ̂I have one final message for you, before you head to the Core... please, watch the recording on this device.
